init.desc:
Create sample setup file
Usage: couchpenter init

setup.desc:
Create databases and documents, overwrite if documents exist
Usage: couchpenter [-u/--url <url>] [-f/--setup-file <setupFile>] [-d/--dir <dir>] setup

options.desc: CouchDB URL in format http://user:pass@host:port, default: http://localhost:5984
Setup file, default: couchpenter.json
Documents directory, default: current working directory

setup-db.desc:
Create databases only
Usage: couchpenter [-u/--url <url>] [-f/--setup-file <setupFile>] [-d/--dir <dir>] setup-db

options.desc: CouchDB URL in format http://user:pass@host:port, default: http://localhost:5984
Setup file, default: couchpenter.json
Documents directory, default: current working directory

setup-doc.desc:

Usage: couchpenter [-u/--url <url>] [-f/--setup-file <setupFile>] [-d/--dir <dir>] setup-doc

Documents directory, default: current working directory

setup-doc-overwrite.desc:
